## PairingHeap.meld() method

Computes union with given heap and clears `heap`<!-- -->, i.e. this heap will take ownership of `heap`<!-- -->'s items (if any).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
meld(heap: PairingHeap<T>): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  heap | <code>PairingHeap&lt;T&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`this`
